bibl.title: Papyri from the Great Tumulus at Vergina, Macedonia
bibl.seg: Richard Janko, Papyri from the Great Tumulus at Vergina, Macedonia.

(i) P. Vergina 1, Tomb of Philipp II. - (ii) P. Vergina 2, Prince's Tomb. Likely a list of the personnal effects of the dead. - (iii) P. Vergina 3, Prince's Tomb. - (iv) P. Vergina 4, Prince's Tomb. - (v) P. Vergina 5, Prince's Tomb (?).
bibl.note: (i) P. Vergina 1, Tomb of Philipp II. - (ii) P. Vergina 2, Prince's Tomb. Likely a list of the personnal effects of the dead. - (iii) P. Vergina 3, Prince's Tomb. - (iv) P. Vergina 4, Prince's Tomb. - (v) P. Vergina 5, Prince's Tomb (?).
